title: President Donald J. Trump’s Administration is Working to Build Stronger Borders – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
March 13, 2018
We must restore integrity and the rule of law at our borders.
						President Donald J. Trump					BUILDING STRONGER BORDERS: President Donald J. Trump is visiting prototypes for the border wall designed to help secure our Southwest border.WALLS WORK: Physical barriers such as walls are a proven, effective means of securing our Southwest border. BORDER SECURITY NEEDS: More resources are needed to secure our borders and deter illegal immigration.A FRAMEWORK FOR SECURING OUR BORDERS: President Trump has released an immigration framework which provides the tools needed to secure our borders.
